path.style: opacity: 1; fill: #000000; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 0.99999994; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1;

opacity: 1; fill: #ff2c12; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1;
